price: 57਼ ਜਿਹੜੇ ਲੋਕ ਆਪਣੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਗੁੱਸੇ ਤੋਂ ਡਰਦੇ ਹਨ।
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
